creator: maria.mere@telefonicacelular.com.br
text:
I don´t know that it is a bug, but when I deploy a Web application into 
WebLogic, using the deploy target the war file is copied into the 
directory /config/telefonica/.wlstaging/  (telefonica is my domain in WebLogic 
Application Server) and not into the directory /config/telefonica/applications

Why? How can I put my application into the correct directory?

Thanks,
Claudia

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
Maria? Is this still a problem? And is it ant related or web logic related? Can
you add a build file?
